website_summaries.verdict: Unique set of coaxial speakers with a special design and profile that will maximize sound quality.
pros: The oval shape of the speaker profile fits the full tweeter, mid-range, subwoofer setup of much larger speakers
Speaker construction uses additional air vents to keep the components cool when in use
cons: Unique shape of the speakers will require some additional cutting into the car during installation

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my stock speakers in my 2016 Ram 2500. Speakers sound 100X better than stock! Very clear sound and a little but better bass. The clarity is great and can crank them up with no distortion. I researched several speakers before doing my install (kicker, Kenwood, Memphis, other pioneers) but these sounded wayyy better and clear than the others (went into a retail store to listen to several before I picked one). I would highly recommend that because you can find the speakers that sound the best to you (more bass, clarity or loudness).
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: Add an amp
customer_reviews.text: WOW these speakers scream. Very loud paired with a 1200 4 channel amp. I cant turn the amp all the way up because these speakers wont handle all that power and Im glad I cant. Base is horrible but I didn't buy them for base.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: I used these in a home system build. They sound awesome and really bump. I paired these with a couple of 8in woofers and use them for the vocals and I am blown away at the sound that comes from these. I love these speakers!!!! Great addition to my home system.
customer_reviews.author: Mari and cole

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with earbuds
customer_reviews.text: False advertising!! These speakers say that they come with earbuds when purchased and definitely DID NOT come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Vega

customer_reviews.title: Not really good quality
customer_reviews.text: I installed them and the sound is ok but tye material feels cheap a part on the speaker broke when i was istalling the cables
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good so far
customer_reviews.text: Didnt fit so well into the crapalier, but they sound good
customer_reviews.author: Haireball

customer_reviews.title: Better than original
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have some great sound. Don't regret buying these because its a lot bettet than stock
customer_reviews.author: TheHondyssey

customer_reviews.title: No bass
customer_reviews.text: No bass at all. I have buy a sectee ree
customer_reviews.author: B nard

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my stock speakers in my 2008 Nissan Frontier with these speakers. They fit perfectly and sound very good.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: They sound great. Nice and clear. I got them for the vocals,not bass.
customer_reviews.author: jose galvan

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are pretty sweet! Loud and surprising bass! Not the clearest but definitely worth the buy. Fit my '03 Mazda Protege but made contact with the back dash grill so I put some closed cell seal tape where they touched.
customer_reviews.author: Gstar

customer_reviews.title: Better than Infinity Reference.
customer_reviews.text: I bought Infinity Reference first. I hated the sound so much that I had to replace them to this in less than 2 weeks. It is much better and sounds much more balanced then Infinity Reference.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Not up to my audio standard. Seems to be lacking in almost every range. Doesn't feel like a full bodied sound.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Gold

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2007 Ram, but with 1/2" spacer
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Big improvement over the stock speakers in my 2007 Dodge Ram. These were listed as saying they would fit my Ram, but they were too large to fit in the speaker opening. I had to purchase a 1/2" spacer to allow them to fit. A bit of a hassle, but it worked out in the end. Metra 82-6902 Universal 1/2" Spacer for 6" x 9" Speakers
customer_reviews.author: Moose & Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Bagger Riders, You Can't Go Wrong!!
customer_reviews.text: RIDERS, if you are looking for Loud, Clean, and Clear affordable speakers with good bass that can handle watts, you can't go wrong. I replaced my over priced, heavy Hertz for these and can't be more pleased. Note: everyone's setup is different.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas06

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit/ no seller response
customer_reviews.text: The speakers showed up and it took a while to get them out of the box. I got them into the door panel and they didn't fit my 6x9 hole in it. These are way too wide of a speaker and the seller does not respond to any return emails at all. Do not buy this is a joke
customer_reviews.author: Tanner S.

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Way better that the 5.25” 2 way Pioneers that were installed.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Major sound!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced front speakers. Combined with Pioneer head unit and Rockford Fosgate amp. Major sound!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers I replaced my factory JBL speakers from ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers I replaced my factory JBL speakers from my Toyota Tacoma.. Easy install and the sounds is by far better then the factory speakers
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: they sound awesome. For 6x9's
customer_reviews.text: Using these in my radio cooler.... and with a 400 watt amp behind them.... they sound awesome. For 6x9's, pretty decent punch too.
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: They fit nice and sound decent good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If they fit your rig and you're looking for a decent priced speaker, get it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 2002 Mini Cooper. They were installed in the rear and WOW what an improvement!!! They don't sound muddy like the original ones and they kick A LOT harder. No modification needed. I was afraid they wouldn't fit because they were huge in person compared to the pictures. All I had to do was make a little adapter harness because I did't want to cut the original connector off.
customer_reviews.author: Timmah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit a 2002 dodge stratus se front panels like Amazon page said it would fit! They only fit on the back.
customer_reviews.text: This speakers sound good and have a pretty nice bass! The only problem I had with them is the they didn't fit my 2002 dodge stratus se, On the front door panels they didn't fit, the speakers are to dip on the back so they hit the window when you put it down.
customer_reviews.author: Elthon

customer_reviews.title: let it burn in
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with these speakers but after a few days of use I could really hear the difference. At first, voices sounded like they were inside a tunnel and the bass was lacking. Now they are producing amazing sound powered by my A.M headunit which gives it approx. 22 watts rms. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: hunter

customer_reviews.title: bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: These can barely handle fifteen watts before distorting. Total junk. Not what I purchased because what I purchased claims they can handle ninety watts nominally and 550 watts max. I could destroy these within a day playing them at one quarter of max volume on my stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

product_meta.title: Pioneer TS-A6970F A Series 6" X 9" 600 Watts Max 5-Way Car Speakers Pair with Carbon and Mica Reinforced Injection Molded Polypropylene (IMPP) Cone Construction w/Free ALPHASONIK Earbuds
product_meta.description:

multilayer Carbon and mica reinforced IMPP woofer
elastic polymer surround 11mm, 18mm pet dome tweeters 9mm pet dome Super tweeter
top-mount depth: 2 7/8"/ 4 ohms impedance
frequency response: 34 - 25, 000 Hz/ Sensitivity: 89 db
